original_text: They buried him beside the kings in the City of David. They gave him that honour, because he had done many good things in Israel for God and for the temple.
korean_text: 무리가 다윗 성 여러 왕의 묘실 중에 장사하였으니 이는 그가 이스라엘과 하나님과 그의 성전에 대하여 선을 행하였음이더라

sentences.original_text: They buried him beside the kings
because he had done many good things
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그가 많은 선한 일들을 했기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: for God and for the temple
